Selamaat pagiii, sudah kah ber olahraga. Walau di taman depan rumah saja tetap sempetin olahraga. Tiap pagi jalan2 atau lari sambil jemut anak dan biar mereka ada hiburan hehe. 
Mau lanjut sharing progres Ibu menyusui yang sedang proses menurunkan berat badan supaya kembali singset. Hahaha, jujur aku bukan tipe ibu2  yang hanya dengan mengASIhi bisa langsung kurus. Mungkin juga karena tiap hamil naiknya sampe 25 kg. 2 minggu awal selalu susut langsung 15-16 kg dan Mau nurunin 10-15kg lagi masih lumayan stuck. 
Tapi gakpapa yang penting ASI masih lancar. Btw walau belum kuruss dan pipi masih supeerr chubby, tapi perut itu wajib banget di kecilin salah satunya dengan bengkung dan bisa dilanjutin pakai korset. Kayaa aku biar badaan belum langsing tapii perut udah tepleek duluann. Dr awal pake size XL, udah progres skr size M udah kegedean. Jadi lagi tunggu pesenan @wonderfulwaist size S. Yang aku pake ini tipe breathable 25 bones. Jadi di lubang lubang di latexnya yang bikin nyaman dan ga pengap kalau aktifitas. Superrrr pw dipakenya buat kegiatan. Yang ikutin progres aku pasti tahuuu bgt aku share di stories perkembangan perut dan korset ini. Semoga bisa bantuu yah. Karena banyak yang nanyaaain. Hehe

*Vicky Shu X Talasi is Out Now!* Kolaborasi terbaruku kali ini dipersembahkan untuk kedua anakku Abimanyu dan Guinandra. Sebagai seorang Ibu, aku sangat concern dengan produk yang mereka pakai sehari-hari.  Teruntuk ibu-ibu dan teman-teman yang concernnya sama seperti aku, aku mau merekomendasikan *produk kolaborasi Vicky Shu X Talasi* yaitu To-ye Telon Oil dan To-ye Cajeput Oil.

Kenapa aku pilih berkolaborasi denganTalasi? Jujur, aku sudah jatuh cinta pada saat pertama kali mencoba dan memakai produk Talasi, sangat berkualitas dan memberikan rasa aman pada saat dipakai.

Satu hal yang membuat aku ingin semakin dekat dan mengenal lebih dalam lagi karena komitmen Talasi, memberikan _produk berkualitas langsung dari origin-nya ke tangan konsumen_.  Sungguh kebanggaan tersendiri untuk semakin mencintai produk-produk asli Indonesia dengan kualitas premium.

Boleh ya aku sharing sedikit pengalamanku :
• To-ye Telon Oil

Semangat adek ku tersayang @kalialabitta_ . Lala adalah dokter gigi yang sedang mengambil specialis bedah mulut di UNPAD Bandung. Lala bertugas di RSHS bandung. Kebetulan lala harus melakukan tindakan kepada korban kecelakaan yang dikhawatirkan merupakan OTG karena  berkaitan dengan positif Covid-19 . Apresiasi tinggi terhadap bapak tersebut karena sudah jujur akan kondisinya . Sehingga tenaga medis diharapkan bisa melakukan perlindungan diri semaksimal mungkin ketika mengobati pasien.

Sekali lagi mengucapkan banyak terimakasih untuk semua garda terdepan yang harus berhadapan langsung dengan para pasien Covid19. Termasuk menghimbau dan berterimakasih kepada semua penderita yang mau berkata jujur menjelaskan kondisinya. Karena itu sangat berarti terutama bagi para petugas medis. Saya ikut prihatin dan berdoa mendengar bahwa sebanyak 46  tenaga medis di RSUP Kariadi Semarang positif covid. Mulai sekarang jauhkan stigma negatif pasien Covid-19. Bayangkan jika itu menimpa kalian atau keluarga kalian. Marilah kita gotong royong berdoa dan melakukan yang terbaik untuk memutus rantai virus ini.

*Vicky Shu X Talasi is Out Now!* Kolaborasi terbaruku kali ini dipersembahkan untuk kedua anakku Abimanyu dan Guinandra. Sebagai seorang Ibu, aku sangat concern dengan produk yang mereka pakai sehari-hari.  Teruntuk ibu-ibu dan teman-teman yang concernnya sama seperti aku, aku mau merekomendasikan *produk kolaborasi Vicky Shu X Talasi* yaitu To-ye Telon Oil dan To-ye Cajeput Oil.

Kenapa aku pilih berkolaborasi denganTalasi? Jujur, aku sudah jatuh cinta pada saat pertama kali mencoba dan memakai produk Talasi, sangat berkualitas dan memberikan rasa aman pada saat dipakai.

Satu hal yang membuat aku ingin semakin dekat dan mengenal lebih dalam lagi karena komitmen Talasi, memberikan _produk berkualitas langsung dari origin-nya ke tangan konsumen_.  Sungguh kebanggaan tersendiri untuk semakin mencintai produk-produk asli Indonesia dengan kualitas premium.

SWIPE LEFT 2 video :

26 Februari 2020. Sebulan sudah Guinandra Janadi Nugroho Putro lahir di dunia. Saking cepat prosesnya sampai2 memang hanya ditemani berdua suami. Bahkan mama @faiza_aljufri, @natashayudhasoka masih di Bandung dan @kalialabitta_ lagi honeymoon di Jepang. Mama dll kaget dan langaung meluncur ke Jakarta begitu tahu sudah lahir. Ceritanyaaa Jam 3 tiba2 ke rumah sakit sudah Bukaan 5, boro2 mikir megang hp dan memang sengaja yang kedua ini pengen sepi sepi aja hahaha. Dan jam 7.16 lahiran. Gak tahu kenapa beda sama pas yang pertama saking lama prosesnya suporter udah banyak banget yang nungguin, dan memang pengen banyak yang nemenin sihh seru aja. Tapi yang kedua kebalikan. Dari beberapa hari sebelumnya sudah ngucap ke suami. Kayaknya lahiran ini pengen sepi2 aja deh. Eh bener keturutan. Baru kabar kabari setelah baby lahir. Untung Ibu mertua sengaja nunggu di Jakarta , dan bareng kakak2 ipar mba @intan2n dan mbak @fitrirosaria memang sedang acara tahajud bersama hafid quran sambil mendoakan baby cepat lahir sehat selamat. Pas sekali selesai acara langsung lahir. MasyaAllah. Terimakasih mbakyuku yang habis tahajud belum tidur langsung meluncur ke rumah nemenin mas Abimanyu. Sekali lagi, Alhamdulillah proses melahirkan sehat selamat ibu dan anak. Sayangnya saking cepatnya momen ketika gelombang cinta dan melahirkan kali ini bener2 ga berhasil dapat..karena baru inget dan cepet2 minta mas ade ngabarin sudah mepeeetttt sekali, akhirnya baru bisa sampai tepat selesai melahirkan. Hi #AURAFAM, we are excited and hyped to be working with the back to back MPL Champions in Philippines originally known as ‘Sunsparks’. With this new venture into the Philippines, we are excited to share this journey with you the fans, and strive to provide the necessary tools to these young, inspiring, talented pros so that we can help them reach their full potential. We have many content, stories, fun challenges we cannot wait to share with you all in the near future. #AURAFIRE 
We hope to make Philippines proud!

Kami memiliki banyak konten, cerita, tantangan menyenangkan yang sangat ingin kami bagikan kepada kalian semua dalam waktu dekat.

TAG TEMEN KAMU...
Udah makan banyak tapi ga gemuk-2 atau Nafsu makannya kurang ? Buruan dicek Instagram @superprotein_offical

Aku rekomendasi banget nih produknya buat kamu yang ingin :
.
- Memiliki Berat Badan Ideal.
- Tampil pede dengan Tubuh Berisi.
- Mewujudkan Cita-Cita menjadi Atlit/ Polisi dan lainnya.
- Lebih Mudah mencari pasangan dengan Tubuh Berisi.
- Penampilan terbaik dan jadi pusat perhatian.

Keunggulan Paket Penggemuk @superprotein_offical

1. Menggemukan Badan secara Cepat, Sehat dan Alami ( Hasil 1-2 Minggu TERBUKTI )
2. Meningkatkan Volume Pertumbuhan Tulang agar gemuknya BERISI bukan melar.
3. Meningkatkan Nafsu Makan serta memperbaiki Metabolisme tubuh agar makanan yg dikonsumsi dapat TERSERAP maksimal.
4. Mengandung Multivitamin Zinc, Vitamin D dan Berbagai Nutrisi untuk membantu Pertumbuhan.
5. Aman Tanpa Efek Samping sedikitpun ( BPOM dan Halal )

Dan karna kandunganya Herbal Alami bisa dikonsumsi dari usia 3 Tahun ke atas loh , sudah saatnya Impian kamu mempunyai Berat Badan yg Ideal terwujud setelah Mengkonsumsi Paket Penggemuk @superprotein_offical

*TRENDING TOPIK INDONESIA*
Seorang pelajar berhasil meraih penghargaan tertinggi atas ditemukannya sebuah metode baru tentang penurunan berat badan.

Menariknya, dalam temuan tersebut diketahui berat badan dapat turun sebanyak 15 kilo gram hanya dalam sepekan, tanpa menggunakan bahan yang mengandung unsur kimia, tanpa kuatir merasa lapar bahkan tanpa perlu berolahraga.

Hal mengejutkan ini terjadi di salah satu universitas di Amerika Serikat, tepatnya pada musim semi tahun 2019.

Dua profesor, empat orang pekerja ilmiah dan sekelompok pengajar dalam kurun waktu sepuluh menit berdiri dan memberikan tepuk tangan riuh untuk seorang gadis asal Indonesia.

Rina Kusumastuti ialah mahasiswi asal Indonesia yang berhasil menemukan formula unik yang mampu menurunkan berat badan dalam waktu singkat, tanpa perlu membatasi asupan makanan.

Temuan ini merupakan hasil dari penelitian dan proses penulisan tesisnya, di mana hasil temuannya ini menuai pujian dari para peneliti terkemuka di dunia.

Dalam temuannya ini, Rina menawarkan ide jenius yang proses realisasinya akan ditangani oleh struktur ilmiah Indonesia. Para pakar asupan makanan dan sejumlah pakar di bidang lain akan ikut ambil bagian dalam pengembangan produk di mana formulanya didasarkan atas hasil riset yang dilakukan Rina Kusumastuti.

Seperti diketahui obat tersebut telah dibuat dan menunjukkan hasil yang positif.

Real life
Udah makan banyak tapi ga gemuk-2 atau Nafsu makannya kurang ? Buruan dicek Instagram @super.protein_orii

Aku rekomendasi banget nih produknya buat kamu yang ingin :
.
- Memiliki Berat Badan Ideal.
- Tampil pede dengan Tubuh Berisi.
- Mewujudkan Cita-Cita menjadi Atlit/ Polisi dan lainnya.
- Lebih Mudah mencari pasangan dengan Tubuh Berisi.
- Penampilan terbaik dan jadi pusat perhatian.

Keunggulan Paket Penggemuk @super.protein_orii

1. Menggemukan Badan secara Cepat, Sehat dan Alami ( Hasil 1-2 Minggu TERBUKTI )
2. Meningkatkan Volume Pertumbuhan Tulang agar gemuknya BERISI bukan melar.
3. Meningkatkan Nafsu Makan serta memperbaiki Metabolisme tubuh agar makanan yg dikonsumsi dapat TERSERAP maksimal.
4. Mengandung Multivitamin Zinc, Vitamin D dan Berbagai Nutrisi untuk membantu Pertumbuhan.
5. Aman Tanpa Efek Samping sedikitpun ( BPOM dan Halal )

Dan karna kandunganya Herbal Alami bisa dikonsumsi dari usia 3 Tahun ke atas loh , sudah saatnya Impian kamu mempunyai Berat Badan yg Ideal terwujud setelah Mengkonsumsi Paket Penggemuk @super.protein_orii

Ini sebagian kecil suara penyemangat yang bisa saya tulis melalui pesan deskripsi donasi untuk para pekerja informal garda terdepan yang terdampak pandemik.

Dan saya bersama @yayasan.anakbangsabisa ,mau mengajak teman-teman semua untuk bersama-sama menyisihkan sebagian rezeki dan ikut #sumbangsuara untuk rekan-rekan kita seperti pedagang asongan, supir angkutan, driver ojek pangkalan dan online, dan lain-lain yang harus mengadu nasib bekerja di luar rumah untuk mencukupi kebutuhannya.

Bantu mereka dengan cara:
1. Buka kitabisa.com/bintangsumbangsuara
2. Klik donasi sekarang
3. Pilih metode pembayaran
4. Tulis pesan penyemangat untuk garda terdepan

Jadi walaupun diem di rumah juga kita tetep bisa #DiRumahTerusmaju dong. Langsung aja ke tsel.me/VA kalo mau tau lebih detail. Follow Instagram @telkomsel juga buat tau info & promo menarik lainnya.

Syarat dan Ketentuan Gofood:
1. Promo hanya berlaku di aplikasi GOFOOD
2. Khusus untuk pembelian paket HARKULNAS
3. TIDAK BERLAKU pembelian di store
4. Periode 08 April - 5 Mei 2020

Giant panda Yuan Zai’s little sister at Taipei Zoo is 10 days old today! The cub weighs 394.6 grams now and the classic black-and-white color has revealed on her body. As she was slightly injured during birth, she is artificially fed for now, while her mother, Yuan Yuan, is given a baby doll to help her practice being a mom. Let’s hope the mother and daughter will live together soon!
（Photo credit: Taipei Zoo special thank to ETtoday）

<Episode 2>Giant panda Yuan Yuan delivers the second cub in Taipei
A heart-warming clip of giant panda Yuan Yuan delivering her second cub for our panda lovers!
Giant panda Yuan Yuan delivers the second cub in Taipei2020 at Taipei Zoo. It took her more than five hours to deliver the cub, weighing 186 grams. It was heard squealing after coming into the world and was immediately comforted by Yuan Yuan. The cub has received proper treatment after minor injury was found on her back and is artificially fed for the moment. Best wishes to her! (Video credit Taipei Zoo&Special thank to Ettoday)

Panda Yuan Yuan gives birth to second cub in Taipei Zoo

The female giant panda in Taipei Zoo, Yuan Yuan, gave birth to a panda cub on June 28, 2020. Currently, both the mother and the baby are in stable condition and under close observation. This is the second time that Yuan Yuan became a mother. She gave birth to her first baby, Yuan Zai in 2013. (photo credit: Taipei Zoo)

Great news! Panda with both parents from the wild gives birth to a healthy cub after natural mating
Giant panda Xin Xin gave birth to a female cub who weighs 188.3 grams 11 minutes after midnight on 23rd June at Shenshuping base, China Conservation and Research Centre for the Giant Pandas. This is the first newborn baby welcomed at the CCRCGP this year. Xin Xin, the mother, was born in 2013 to a couple both from the wild, Bai Yang and Hai Zi and this is the second child she ever delivers. 🐼

Kau ciptakan dunia.. Kau hadirkan manusia.. Kau beri keindahan.. Yang hanya sementara.. Siapa yang bacanya sambil nyanyi? Sekalian aja yuk ikutan program terbaru Langit Musik X @vmcmusic sudah hadir nih. Hadiahnya mantap banget Samsung S10, voucher belanja jutaan rupiah dan pulsa Telkomsel!

Yang harus kamu lakukan:
1. Pastinya harus pengguna Telkomsel [kartu Halo,Simpati dan As]
2. Streaming playlist Do’a Ramadhan 2020 di aplikasi Langit Musik.
3. Follow akun Instagram & twitter : @langitmusik dan @vmcmusic
4. Kamu wajib share lagu-lagu di playlist "Do’a Ramadhan 2020" dengan caption Do’a untuk Bulan Ramadhan 2020 dan sertakan hashtag #DoaRamadhan2020 dan wajib tag/mention @langitmusik dan @vmcmusic serta mention 2 orang teman

Peraturannya:
1. Pemilihan pemenang berdasarkan proses penjurian oleh pihak artis label VMC
2. Setiap konten yang di-posting atau di-upload pelanggan wajib mengikuti hukum yang berlaku di Negara Indonesia dan tidak mengandung unsur pornografi, SARA, kebencian dan kekerasan
3. Program ini tidak berlaku untuk keluarga dan karyawan PT. Telekomunikasi Selular dan PT. Melon Indonesia
.
Periode : 29 April 2020 – 29 Juni 2020
.
Total Hadiah :
Pemenang Utama : HP Samsung S10
Pemenang 2 - 4 : Voucher Belanja Rp 1,000,000/org
Pemenang 5 - 8 : Pulsa Telkomsel Rp 500,000.org
.
Info lebih lanjut : https://www.langitmusik.co.id/new/promoDetail/1153

Semoga kita semua selalu jaga kesehatan ya, bukan cuma diri sendiri, tp buat orang-orang serumah juga. Jangan lupa rajin cuci tangan dengan sabun, dan senantiasa memakai masker. Social distancing sangat penting, jangan keluar rumah kalau tidak bener2 perlu.

Udah hampir seminggu nih aku kerja dari rumah, main, bahkan belanja. Beli kebutuhan beras, mie instant, minyak goreng, vitamin, sabun, masker, hand sanitizer, bahkan termometer semua bisa #BelanjaDariRumah! Tinggal buka app @Shopee_ID aja, semua pasti ada😉
Gak perlu khawatir karena ada Gratis Ongkir XTRA Ekstra 100 Voucher🤗

Kesehatan kita nomor satu, jadi jaga diri (dan jaga jarak) baik-baik yaa semua❤ Kasih tau aku dong di kolom komentar, kalian di rumah ngapain aja sih?😆

Hallo Sahabat Sabyan!!!
.
Saksikan kami Di acara RUANG GURU minggu tanggal 5 Januari 2020 Jam 19.30 malam WIB - serentak ditayangkan di 10 stasiun TV nasional atau bisa juga ditonton live di aplikasi @ruangguru.

.
.
Senang banget Nissa bisa kepilih jadi Brand Ambassador @ruangguru. Nissa udah lama denger soal aplikasi @ruangguru dan selalu kagum liat sepak terjang mereka. Kadang pas lagi show atau tour di daerah dan ngobrol sama fans, banyak banget yang cerita kalo mereka juga pake @ruangguru buat bantu belajarnya. Ini yang bikin aku makin salut sama teman-teman di @ruangguru. Bayangin, siapa aja jadi bisa belajar di mana aja dari guru-guru terbaik, cuma dari HP! Keren banget!

Makanya pas ditawarin jadi #ruanggurusquad, Nissa langsung excited. Aku pengen pakai kesempatan ini sebaik-baiknya buat motivasi dan kasih inspirasi khususnya buat sahabat Sabyan supaya makin semangat belajarnya dan mengejar cita-citanya.

Menyambut pengumuman Nissa sebagai #ruanggurusquad yang baru ini, @ruangguru bagi-bagi diskon sebesar 55% dengan kode JADIJUARA! Ada paket belajar baru loh, ada paket semester yang harganya  dr Rp695.000 jadi Rp312.000, dan juga paket 1.5 tahun yang dari Rp1.325.000 jadi Rp623.000. Buruan langganan sekarang dan segera dimanfaatkan kesempatan ini.
.
Daaan Aku punya kabar gembira lagi! Aku bakalan tampil spesial hari Minggu nanti, tanggal 5 Januari 2020 Jam 19.30 malam WIB - serentak ditayangkan di 10 stasiun TV nasional atau bisa juga ditonton live di aplikasi @ruangguru. Aku bakal ngapain? Eitss.. nonton ya! Selain aku ada juga @misellia_, @nashwaaaz, @anneth.dlc, @betrandpetoputraonsu dan masih banyak lagi.

Serunya lagi selama tayangan nanti, sahabat Sabyan kalau ikutan Live Quiz Ruangguru selama acara berlangsung dengan hadiah ratusan juta rupiah! Wow! Jangan sampai gak ikutan ya... Semoga dengan bergabungnya Nissa di @ruangguru ini bisa jadi berkah buat semua ya!

Karena Susu Hilo Active memenuhi 100% AKG Vitamin D dalam tubuh. bagus untuk Imun dalam tubuh, jadi untuk orang seperti gw yang males banget berjemur dibawah matahari ini solusi bagusnya. susu Hilo Active dengan kemasan barunya yang bernuansa ala-ala kota Venice dan london gitu.

Susu #HiLoActive mencukupi 100% kebutuhan AKG Vitamin D untuk tubuh! Jadi imun tubuh lebih diperkuat dan juga ga perlu khawatir kalau ga sempet berjemur atau repot keluar rumah.
Buat kalian yang beli langsung di online storenya @hilo bisa dapatkan promo free masker khusus dari Hilo dan juga mug.

Pengganti sekolah Kanaka sementara

Aku share lg, jd sementara Kanaka ngejalanin private class di rumah ini selama satu tahun kedepan tiap 3x seminggu

Sekolah Kanaka yg biasa aku stop dulu, insyaallah lanjut lagi tahun depan setelah pandemi mereda pastinya

Knp? Tiap ibu pasti punya pertimbangan yg beda2 ya, klo aku kebetulan di Kanaka kelas online agak kurang berjalan mulus & alhamdulillah nya tetangga beda 5rmh dari rmh ku adalah guru di salah satu International school dan ex guru di sekolah Kanaka juga dgn pengalaman 20thn 😍
Jd gak kalah sama kelas international school cm ini lbh Private aja

Passss lahhhh! Aku awalnya minta utk Private di rmh aja, tp kak @missjuwilia tetangga ku ini nawarin gmn klo di rmh ku aja ku sulap jadi semacam kelas?

Dan terjadi lah @skolefriends yg hanya menerima Private Class utk saat ini

Dan Kanaka udah 2minggu jalanin kelas nya dan alhamdulillah aku happy bgt sama perkembangan Kanaka

Sampe saat ini anak2 yg ikut Private class cm ada 5org

4 anak di kelas kanaka (usia 4-5th)
1 anak kelas special needs krn mereka ada teacher khusus special needs, namanya kelas amazing kids

Masih ada 1sesi lg seperti nya info nya yg akan di buka hanya utk 4 anak, & beberapa anak special needs klo yg mungkin ada yg butuh bgt aku taro aja no telv nya ya +62 838-7951-2558

Tempat nya di daerah cirendeu, masih deket ke lebak bulus krn masuknya dari situ gintung

Syarat anak nya masuk sini agak ketat, keluarga serumah hrs sudah rapid test semua & keterangan sehat dari dokter utk anak nya, klo ada yg nungguin jg hrs nyerahin rapid test per 2minggu demi keamanan bersama

Buat yg rmh nya jauh, coba follow @skolefriends aja disitu banyak cara2 buat activity anak di rmh yg bs diikutin juga

Nb: minggu ini Kanaka aku Private in bahasa inggris juga di rumah, Ada guru Private yg dtg 2x seminggu aku book ke mbah nya guru2 bahasa inggris @irshadiarif

Duhhh new normal ini kadang liat org2 kayak normal aja, tp liat update covid makin beratttt

Siapa yg masih kuat bertahan gak keluar rmh samsek ?
Siapa yg udah berani aktifitas kayak biasa?

Intinya terus jaga kesehatan, imunitas tubuh terus dijaga & Jangan pernah lupa pandemi ini masih berjalan, selalu inget protokol new normal

Pake face shield + masker sesuai anjuran, jgn lupa handsanitizer tetep diutamakan cuci tangan

Jalan pagi ini bawa buntut!

45menit nonstop, tanpa keringet, tanpa capek udah berjalan persis 10hari!

Manfaat nya apa? Sebenernya jalan 45menit, hanya jalan biasa itu bagus buat jantung, bagus juga buat peredaran darah, buat yg lg mau promil ya ini salah satu kegiatan yg bagusnya di lakuin

Trus bs nurunin berat? Bisa! 10hari ini aku ada penurunan 2kg, berat sih gak terlalu significant cuma badan berasa lebih enak an bgt, trus kebawa pengen gerak lebih banyak jd main sama anak2 makin ok

Kenapa gak boleh keringetan? Krn bukan mau bakar Kalori, klo yg dibakar kalori kita perlu energy juga yg masuk (jatohnya laperan) atau massa otot malah bertambah (jatoh nya berat gak akan bs turun)

Utk si gembil kayak aku, kita jalan pagi aja sambil atur pola makan (ternyata makan tepat waktu itu penting bgt, on time se on time on time nya) bikin jadwal makan ingetin pake alarm

Misal nya:
Sarapan 09.00
Makan siang 12.00
Snack time 15.30
Makan malem 19.00
Snack time 21.00

Pasang alarm & makan ontime cuma boleh telat 10menit maksimal!
Coba makan bersih & ditaker konsisten! Misal nasi 5sendok makan melentung 😜, ya tiap hari harus segitu konsisten

Segitu sharing hari ini soal jalan 45menit & atur gaya makan

Nb: snack nya snack kecil aja ya, buah misal 3-4potong atau biskuit yg rendah kalori & gula

Jgn lupa , tepung ,minyak, gula babay dulu

Klo mau manis bs pake gula diet 💪🏻

Semoga sehat! Makasih kiriman story nya banyak bgt yg semangat jalan 45menit demi SEHAT

#fitTyaariestya

Jadi gak boleh olahraga?

Jd hari ini diajarin sama tante Eva utk kelas SI nya, klo oral motor (utk makan nya) sama tante Icha dan mereka pasti koordinasi terus mengenai perkembangan Kalundra

Jd ini pelajaran yg bs aku share hari ini, TEKSTUR! Banyak yg pasti agak susah ganti tekstur makanan anaknya ini bs dicoba ternyata anak kita mesti dilatih mengenal tekstur dulu tubuh nya, indra peraba nya, bs coba jalan di rumput, aspal, karpet, buat lengket an dari tepung kasih air dikit bs kasih dia mainin pegang2, pake beras , pasir, slime dan lainnya

Simple, belajar tekstur dulu ternyata bs berhubungan dengan naik tekstur dia di makanan 😁

Akhirnya Kanaka STOP sekolah 1tahun kedepan

Dilema sekolah anak , dari kmaren mikir2 panjang di usia Kanaka yg sebenernya banyak butuh aktifitas yg bikin dia kreatif & kemampuan bersosialisasi mereka terus baik, blm lagi basic basic yg memang banyak dikenalkan di masa TK itu penting bgt

Cm klo aku pribadi kayaknya di kondisi ini akhirnya mutusin satu tahun kedepan Kanaka akan di RUMAH aja, tp gak juga diem aja sih rencananya aku mau kasih beberapa courses private di rmh kayak Bahasa inggris, music , ngaji, sama utk ngejar stop sekolah nya pas bgt kebetulan tetangga ada yg profesi nya emang guru utk seumuran Kanaka di salah satu International school dan akhirnya dia buka private class di rmh nya

Nah ini nge gambar kaos jg bs jd salah satu bentuk aktifitas kita di rmh, dan pastinya mesti cari2 kegiatan & mainan yg bs bikin mereka kreatif terus sih

Ini hasil mewarnai kaos Kanaka lucu bgt deh, dia mau warnain gajah nya pake warna abu2 (tapi spidol nya gak ada) akhirnya dia kreatif campur warna hitam sama coklat! Walaupun warnanya blm mendekati warna abu, tp aku tuh bangga bgt anak nya punya inisiatif tinggi

Tinggal tugas kita nih ibu-ibu cari ide terus!

Aku share ya rencana aku utk Kakak kanaka: •Private class pengganti TK sm tante @missjuwilia yg akhirnya bikin Private class di rmh nya @skolefriends (beda kayak cm 5rmh dari rmh aku) dan standart metode ngajar nya international school bgt dgn fasilitas yg lengkap bgt di rmh nya, nanti aku post di story deh aku bs mampirin rumah nya
•Bahasa inggris lg coba diatur Private class nya sama om @irshadiarif utk guru Private English course nya
•Guru music mungkin udah termasuk di Private class nya @skolefriends nanti katanya tiap minggu ada bermusik nya
•Guru ngaji, aku masih cari nih di daerah cirendeu yg jago ngajarin anak2 dgn metode gak boring ada yg mau kasih ide? (Aku cari yg udah profesional tp nya)

Utk therapy nya skrg masih blm mulai krn masih tahap penyesuaian juga, btw buat yg nanya biaya dll aku sempet story in td jd liat di story aku aja ya

Si gemes Kalundra di tumbuh kembang

Hari pertama stimulasi sensori integrasi

Kalundra masih perkenalan, jd utk kelas tumbuh kembang aku ambil 2 kelas :

1. Oral motor (ini utk ngelatih makan Kalundra yg masih suka di lepeh)
2. Sensori integrasi (ini utk terapi Kalundra supaya klo naik mobil gak muntah2 lagi)

Perkenalan di hari pertama , Kalundra nya happy bgt banyak mainan & so far perkembangan pertumbuhan Kalundra sesuai anak se usia nya

Trus Kenapa therapy?
Kalundra lg terus di stimulasi oral motor nya (bagian mulut) supaya kemampuan makannya lbh pinter lagi & utk muntah2 klo naik mobil akan di banyakin stimulasi yg melibatkan grafitasi (ayunan, trampolin, tangga, dll)

Bener2 kebuka pengetahuan pas liat therapy nya ternyata apa apa yg bs dilakukan sehari2 bener2 klo kita tau dan jalanin bs berpengaruh banyak ke depannya utk pertumbuhan anak anak

Coba yg suka larang anaknya naik turun tangga mana suara nya?? Atau mungkin yg suka larang anak nya klo tangannya masuk ke mulut?

Nah 2 itu ternyata bagus bgt buat pertumbuhan mereka di usia Kalundra,

Aku share sedikit2 ya nanti, ini masih awal2 pertemuan nemenin Kalundra di kelas tumbuh kembang di rs bunda menteng lbh kayak sekolah sih aku liat tp bener2 bikin fondasi yg bagus buat pertumbuhan anak2

Doakan Kalundra biar cepet lbh pinter ya mamam nya 😉

#kalundratumbuhkembang

Bisa bisa aja kok, Alhamdullilah dapet banyak informasi dari dokter @ivnsini mulai dari sekarang ada swab test yg butuh waktu cuma 2jam aja di @diagnoslab

Sampe bisa bgt buat yg dari daerah mau ke Jakarta buat pengobatan ke RS mana aja melalui protokol yg aman bgt

Silahkan yg lagi usaha Program Hamil juga bs dengerin tanya jawab sama dokter @ivnsini mengenai PCO & persentasi keberhasilan Bayi Tabung

Susah hamil tp punya 2 yg begini

Masyaallah alhamdulillah, dikasih hadiah yg luar biasa

Vonis nya dulu pas sebelum nikah akan 3x lebih susah hamil & 3x lebih mudah keguguran dari perempuan normal lain nya

Ampe bilang ke Ayah nya anak2 “ksian nanti km gak bs punya anak, km cari calon istri yg lain aja” dan calon suami waktu itu bilang :
1. Loh kok nyerah sebelum usaha!?
2. Gak boleh gitu, anak itu titipan Allah, rejeki DIA yg nentuin
3. Kita coba santai aja nanti! Usaha pertama tetep kita coba normal seperti biasa, nanti klo gak bs jg kita ke dokter bs minum obat, klo gak bs jg masih banyak program hamil yg canggih2 kok
4. Tapi klo gak bisa juga kita bs adopsi anak, kan titipan gak mesti selalu keluar dari rahim km 🙂 (yg ini dia ngomong dengan santai kayak gak ada beban)

Langsung lah terenyuh dan makin yakin dikirimin CALON SUAMI yg paling special dari Allah!

Beberapa bulan kemudian kita (aku & ayah nya anak2) nikah
Pulang honeymoon aku lgsg minum obat PCO setiap hari selama 1.5tahun ampe akhirnya tau ada program bayi tabung di @morulaivf_jakarta dan nyobain program IVF

Alhamdulillah ternyata rejeki nya emang harus usaha lebih & disitu! Dititipin lah 2 anak ini dan alhamdulillah nya bs langsung dari rahim aku dgn bantuan teknologi canggih yg namanya BAYI TABUNG

Ahhhhhhh panjang ceritanya, yg penting aku mau kasih semangat nya buat yg lain! Yg nama nya rejeki udah ada yg atur, diwaktu yg tepat dan semoga kalian yg masih berusaha segera dikasih senyuman buah hati kalian kelak! SOON, amin

Nanti jam 10 pagi buat yg mau nanya2 ttg bayi tabung aku live IG sama jago nya IVF, bahkan dokter bayi tabung aku pun belajar nya dari beliau

Aku bakal ngobrol bareng dokter @ivnsini , siap2 pantengin & siapin pertanyaan bagus ya!

Bagi bagi masker GRATIS nih!

Salam sehat Indonesia
Ada kabar baik buat teman-teman.
Sekarang ada program GEMAS (Gerakan Memakai Masker Gratis), yang akan bagi-bagi jutaan masker kain GRATIS 
Ingat ya, pakai masker itu harus untuk kesehatan kita bersama, terutama disaat wabah corona
Memang awalnya kurang nyaman. Tapi lama-lama akan terbiasa. Dan jangan lupa, sebelum dipakai dan setiap hari masker kainnya harus dicuci bersih ya !
WA di nomor 0813-1920-0030
Sekali lagi ini GRATIS, jadi jangan mau kalau ada yang memperjual belikan. Kita ambil sesuai kebutuhan. Karena banyak saudara kita yang membutuhan
Ikutan GEMAS ya. 
Indonesia pasti bisa melalui semua cobaan ini.

Kalundra mulai therapy

Buat yg udah baca postingan beberapa sebelum ini Kalundra aku bawa ke dokter tumbuh kembang mengenai makan Kalundra yg suka di lepeh (hampir semua makanan yg masuk di lepeh)

Dan ternyata stelah di cek gerakan lidah Kalundra baru kedepan & belakang jd butuh stimulasi Oral Motor tambahan

Mengenai nafsu makan /keinginan makan sudah ok, tinggal proses stimulasi lidah bs support gerakan lbh banyak supaya makanan bs ditempat kan di tempat seharusnya utk dikunyah lalu kemudian bs ditelen dengan baik sama anak2

Jd aku akan rutin therapy oral motor (utk makan) Kalundra & therapy Sensori Integrasi (utk muntah2 Kalundra klo naik mobil)

Jd jgn anggep ke Tumbuh Kembang anak mesti ada keterlambatan dulu, intinya klo kita lbh tau apa2 yg harus kita perhatikan & harus kasih stimulasi lebih pasti lbh baik juga buat anak2

Buat info aja, utk tumbuh kembang atas referensi DSA Kalundra dokter @mel97819 kita di referensi in ke dokter khusus tumbuh kembang anak dr Luh di @rsiabundajakarta

Doakan cepet pinter yaaaaa mamam nya Kalundra biar gak di lepeh2 terus 😍

Perkembangan nya & klo ada yg bisa aku sampein nanti aku share ya 😍

PR kita Kalundra akan minum jus2 dengan tekstur yg seperti air jeruk 😉

Yg pasti gak bakal nempel2 di masker kalian lipcream nya, trus gak bikin bibir kering walaupun ini matte & krn lg Diskon bersubsidi 50% all items jd harga nya emang agak gak masuk akal murah nya ☺️ Lipcream ini sebenernya aku bikin buat support temen2 yg lg program IVF, ibu hamil dan ibu menyusui, tp alhamdulillah malah respon nya semua nya suka pake nya 🙏🏻 Bs dibeli di toped sm shopee jg kok, klo mau wa lgsg atau ke ig nya jg bisa kok ke @kind.co.id

Yg udah coba angkat tangannya 👆🏻

Kalundra susah makan?
Percaya gak?
Badan se embul gini!

Akhirnya aku share sekarang, berawal dari Kalundra ISK yg akhirnya pertumbuhan berat & tinggi gak bs optimal waktu itu.

Untung aja dsa Kalundra tante @mel97819 cepet liat kondisi dan akhirnya ISK nya cepet ditangani akhirnya kita putusin utk Sunat dini demi kesehatan Kalundra.

Utk sunat dini Kalundra kita pilih dokter senior dr Amir Thayeb dan alhamdulillah penyembuhannya luar biasa cepet, pulang sunat lgsg pake diapers , 5hari gak mandi kena air aja dan anaknya gak ada rewel2 nya.

Abis itu kita lanjutin kejar perkembangan BB Kalundra ke dokter gizi anak paling ok di Jakarta menurut aku, aku ke dr Klara
Disitu pas di liat berat Kalundra bener2 kurang bgt, udah di garis merah! Nyaris ke garis stunting, dan masih bs diperbaiki bgt selama di usia sebelum 2tahun.
Harus segera diperbaiki & untung nya gak telat
2bulan jalan alhamdulillah BB Kalundra malah sampe luber2 😍

Alhamdulillah. Stelah gizi Kalundra cukup, masih ada 1 PR lagi.. Yaitu ke tumbuh kembang anak, Ada beberapa hal yg bs kita perbaiki dgn stimulasi di Kalundra, dia makannya susah cenderung ngelepeh ternyata motorik lidah nya blm terstimulasi maksimal blm lagi Kalundra rajin muntah klo naik mobil butuh stimulasi yg melibatkan grafitasi dan aku baru tau stelah ketemu dr Luh, dr tumbuh kembang yg ok bgt kmaren!

Intinya aku tau ini semua krn aku gak males buat cek kalundra ke dokter sesuai dengan keluhan yg kita alami, aku & suami bukan yg type takut kekurangan kami sekeluarga apa! Tapi lebih ke bagaimana jika kami mempunyai kekurangan secepat mungkin kita cari Solusi yg terbaik

Yg kira2 inti nya , dan alhamdulillah ini dokter yg bagus2 semua aku share di atas mereka praktek semua di @rsiabundajakarta

Semoga sharing pengalaman aku bs bermanfaat buat yg lain ya, jd klo kalian ada kendala sama gak usah susah lg cari dokter , aku udah cerita lumayan full

Insyaallah yg aku share diatas dokter2 terbaik semua versi aku

Monggo yg mau nge share anak susah makan dengan segala macam jenis nya dan solusi nya 👇🏻

Trus dpt diffusernya jg, dpt hadiah tambahan bag diffuser, pouch oil, sama roll on buat tempat ngeracik buat nanti kita bawa2 klo memang udah harus mulai aktifitas lagi

Tinnitus pergi!
Dia udah better!

Tau gak klo si tinnitus itu kembali,
Perasaan dia gak enak, asam lambung naik, panic attack datang, tensi naik, kepala pusing, bawaan marah-marah

Dan kita harus senyum ☺️, sabar, tanya mau nya apa? Semangatin, gak banyak ganggu, tp sigap perhatiin

Klo tinnitus ilang, dia kembali CERIA

Dan hari ini dia feeling better!

Oke, hari ini kita Naik mobil lagi, muter2 aja katanya dia borring mau nyetir sambil ngobrol

Yuk! Mingguan ber 2
Krn udah lupa sama malem mingguan

Nb: yg gak tau tinnitus apa, itu arti dari telinga berdenging 
#ceritatinnitus #tinnitus

Share cerita tinnitus ayah yg sebenernya udah lama bgt membaik,

banyak dokter THT yg udah kita datengin, banyak share yg udah kita laluin,

Awal tinnitus ayah sempet depresi krn gangguan bunyi denging (klo yg ngerasain pasti tau) dan sebagai org terdeket aku hrs lindungin, semangatin krn no 1 kesehatan psikis yg harus dijaga

Sampe akhirnya ayah bs better sampe pulih, tp beberapa hari ini dia dateng lagi (tinny, kita nyebut nya biar gak terlalu menyebalkan) dan ada reaksi agak panas di telinga

Akhirnya kita cek tht lg sm dokter yg ada, dan malah ketemu dokter yg emang dari dulu pgn kita datengin bgt

Se enak itu consul nya, bahkan dr nya adalah salah satu dokter yg bilang tinnitus bisa sembuh (ini menyenangkan bgt), dan kayaknya kali ini sebab nya agak tegang nya suasana aja, leher kaku, colesterol agak naik & tensi relatif tinggi, itu dulu kita benerin

Buat temen2 yg ngalamin tinnitus juga, jgn ngerasa sendiri! Banyaaak bgt kok! Pelan2, bs di obatin kok! Jgn stress (walau pasti susah bgt) , buat lingkungan yg dukung pasien lebih!

Bentar lg ayah sehat lg kok ☺️, kita udah biasa jalanin semua sama2, cari Solusi nya sama2

#tinnitusbisasembuh #tinnitus 💪🏻 Nb: nama dokter aku hapus ya atas permintaan dm klo perlu info itu pun aku bales sesempetnya 🙂

A 60-meter-long section of a highway in Rangtang County, southwest China's Sichuan Province collapsed on Saturday after the road's subgrade was eroded by rain-triggered floods. A temporary roadway was created beside the destroyed section by about 5 p.m., allowing one-way traffic. The collapsed section will remain out of use until the floodwaters abate enough for it to be repaired.

Featuring surrealist, inventive and stylish interior design with a wide collection of books, the bookstore has attracted numerous bookworms in Beijing. It is one of the branches of the popular Zhongshuge bookshop chain that spread across China. The well-known brand has also won the moniker, "The Most Beautiful Bookstore in China."👏 #bookstore #summertime #cgtn

🤩As temperatures rise, "red beaches" are seen scattered along the coastline in east China's Shandong Province. The red plant is Suaeda salsa, a kind of seepweed. It can adapt to saline or alkaline soil by changing its shape and color. #naturephotography #naturelovers #amazingplaces #cgtn

🌊Torrential rain has been hitting large parts of eastern and central China since the beginning of July, and caused severe flooding in many towns and cities. 🎻Chilean nurse Damaris Silva played the violin for patients infected with COVID-19 at the Intensive Care Unit of the El Pino hospital in Santiago, Chile, July 9. #cgtn #coronavirus #covid_19

📷Under #coronavirus lockdown, UK photographer JJ Waller launched a project in March capturing people behind window panes or closed glass doors. He put up a post across social media asking people to volunteer as subjects for his project. According to the photographer, he used the daily personal exercise time allowed by the government to pursue the project, which means he only got a few minutes to take pictures of individuals and families by their doors or windows. "I hope that the images will play a role in helping people in the future gain some insight into what we experienced during the pandemic." He has published the images collectively as a photography book "Lockdown: Informal Portraits of this Time," documenting "hope and fear in the face of crisis." #cgtn #covid_19

Water was spotted gushing out from all nine spillways on Wednesday at Xin'an River Reservoir in east China's Zhejiang Province for the first time in history to lower the crest of floods. Considered as the biggest reservoir in east China, the reservoir plays an important role in the flood control of the upper reaches of the Qiantang River in Zhejiang. #cgtn #flood #reservoir #china

The APSTAR-6D telecommunication satellite was successfully launched Thursday via a Long March 3B carrier rocket from Xichang Satellite Launch Center, southwest China’s Sichuan Province. Designed and manufactured by the China Academy of Space Technology (CAST), a subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation (CASC), APSTAR-6D is expected to provide high-quality broadband network and data communication services for users across the Asia-Pacific region. #cgtn #china #telecommunication #satellite

People dressed as hummingbirds perform during the "Alas de distancia" strategy, backed by Bogota's mayor, which seeks to promote coronavirus self-care practices, such as physical distancing, as a preventive measure to curb the further spread of COVID-19, in Bogota, the capital city of Colombia, on July 9, 2020. #cgtn #socialdistancing #covid19 #coronavirus #bogota #colombia

👩🏻‍🏫❤️A teacher in south China's Guangdong Province encouraged her injured student who wanted to give up on her exam by carrying her all the way to the exam room on the 5th floor. The student got injured two days ahead of the exam and couldn't stand or walk. A national examination, the Gaokao is an important entrance examination to get into university. With the exam looming, her physical discomfort and psychological anxiety made the student question whether she could sit the exam. Upon learning about it, her teacher, surnamed Cai, comforted her and encouraged her to finish the exam by carrying her on her back to the exam room on the 5th floor of the school building. #gaokao #exam #cgtn

👏🎉China's annual Gaokao, the national college entrance examination, ended in most parts of the country on July 8. The thrilling moment students left the exam venues as they finished one of the toughest exams in their lives was captured by photographers. For the first time, the annual exam, which is usually held in June, was postponed for a month due to the #covid19 outbreak. #gaokao #cgtn

🤍Hundreds of giant white hearts have been painted on a popular green space in Bristol, UK, to remind people to keep social distance and help prevent the spread of #coronavirus as the city is safely reopening with the easing of lockdown restrictions. A team of artists from Upfest – Europe's largest graffiti festival – began spraying the hearts on the grass on July 7. The hearts are approximately three meters wide with at least two meters between them to encourage social distancing. This is part of the initiative "Bristol Together" launched by businesses and leaders in the city to help the city reopen with safe measures. #COVID19 #cgtn

😍📷A lotus flower grown from seeds that had lain dormant underground for more than a hundred years bloomed for the second year at Beijing's Old Summer Palace, or Yuanmingyuan. The second generation of the reborn lotus also entered its blooming season and has attracted many visitors and photographers to appreciate its beauty. The ancient lotus seeds were discovered at a pond in the palace during an archaeological excavation in 2017. #flowers #blossom #cgtn

First, Paris deal. Then, UNESCO. Now, WHO. Will Trump quit Earth next? The Trump administration has formally notified the United Nations of its withdrawal from the World Health Organization, although the pullout won't take effect until next year, meaning the withdrawal could be rescinded under a new administration or if circumstances change. The move was immediately assailed by health officials and critics of the administration, including numerous Democrats who said it would cost the U.S. influence in the global arena.

Pink snow was seen for the first time on parts of the Presena glacier in northern Italy. The phenomenon is caused by algae that develops when snow melts, simultaneously making the ice a darker color. In a vicious circle, the algae in turn increases the rate at which the snow melts by accelerating the absorption of radiation.

🤗In the town of Rijssen in the Netherlands, photographer Albert Beukhof captured images of a vibrantly-colored kingfisher catching fish the kingfisher pitches down from a nearby tree and dives in the water. After capturing a small silver fish, it retreats into the shadow and quietly waits for its next prey. #naturephotography #naturelovers #cgtn

Hong Kong's new security law has been misunderstood and miscommunicated in the UK, China's ambassador Liu Xiaoming has said. The policy was introduced in response to the needs of the city, which has lacked a framework to tackle elements intent on causing chaos and disruption, Liu said at a press conference. 

The National Security Law was implemented in Hong Kong on 30 June to address offenses of secessionism, subversion, terrorism and colluding with a foreign power.

"After the law was adopted, British media carried massive reports and comments, which, to be frank, are full of misinterpretation, misunderstanding and even distortion," Liu said.

The quality of tuna determines the taste of 🍣. But how do you know if the tuna is fresh enough? 🧐A Japanese company developed an AI-based system called "Tuna Scope" that judges the quality of natural tuna using cross-sectional images of their tails. Traditional fish merchants would spend a decade learning how to select high-quality tuna. But now, users can download the phone app and use it anywhere. #technologyisawesome #innovativedesign #cgtn

India opened the world's largest temporary COVID-19 care center in Delhi this week, with 10,000 beds, and a cooling capacity of around 17,500 tonnes of air-conditioners. The size of the center is as large as 22 football fields. 

Also, on Monday, India reported the largest one day increase since the battle against the coronavirus. The country reported 25,000 new cases and 613 deaths in the last 24 hours. To manage a large number of patients, the National Informatics Center has developed an e-hospital app to streamline the process of admission and discharge. 

The admission team has been equipped with 400 computers at the center. The facility has over 600 toilets, including 70 portable ones. The staff said they aim to maintain one toilet for every 10 patients. #covid19 #stayhealthy #india #cgtn

🌇Mother nature can be the most outstanding artist when she draws on the backdrop of the sky. ❤️Monday's sunset in Beijing painted the clouds with an array of glowing colors that entwined in the sky shortly after thunderstorms cleared. #sunset #naturephotography #naturelovers #cgtn

In just one day, over 10 million students across China will sit for the National College Entrance Examination, known as Gaokao in Chinese, which will be a defining moment for their future. Special ceremonies have been held by schools nationwide to send best wishes to students not only for the exams but also for a bright future. In the meantime, related preparations are going on as the whole of society takes the grand examination seriously. This year's Gaokao has already been put off for a month due to the COVID-19 epidemic. And the number of Gaokao candidates has increased by 400,000 compared to last year, according to China's Ministry of Education. #cgtn #gaokao #china #collegeentranceexam #covid19

Yao Ming, president of the Chinese #Basketball Association (CBA), presented two honorary jerseys to Chinese respiratory expert Zhong Nanshan and his wife Li Shaofen as they attended the 2019/2020 CBA League's opening match at Dongguan Basketball Center in south China's Guangdong Province on Friday. This is the first major national sports event to restart in China since the epidemic. #COVID19 #Zhongnanshan #CBA #cgtn

This Indian man has grabbed headlines for his unique face mask. The businessman Shankar Kurhade paid about $4,000 for a bespoke gold face #mask to protect him from the #coronavirus raging in the country. The precious metal covering weighs 60 grams (two ounces) and took craftsmen eight days to make. He got this idea after seeing another man wearing one made from silver. "I am not sure if it will be effective to protect me from a coronavirus infection, but I am taking other precautions," he said. #facemask #gold #socialbuzz #cgtn

Liu Yige, a senior at Bijie Minority High School, Guizhou Province, painted these #portraits as graduation gifts to every classmate at the graduation ceremony. He used his spare time to spend a year and a half sketching 78 students one by one, including his self-portrait. "I hope that these #paintings can make everyone remember their original intentions and strive for their dreams as always." #graduationgift #portrait #cgtn
The California sea lion Edith gave birth to a pup in Zagreb Zoo, #Croatia. The baby sea lion is four days old and was pictured cuddling up to its mommy on July 2, 2020. #sealion #cgtn

The "No.1 Flood" of the Yangtze River was formed on Thursday morning, requiring the Three Gorges reservoir to adjust its outflow. The peak inflow reached 53,000 cubic meters per second, so the reservoir lowered the outflow to 35,000 cubic meters per second, greatly easing flood control pressure in the middle and lower reaches of the river. According to the forecast, the Yangtze River basin will register another three periods of heavy rains in the coming weeks.

😭Hundreds of African elephants have mysteriously died over the last few months, and poaching has been ruled out. While COVID-19 is an unlikely cause, Mark Hiley, the Co-Founder and Operation Director of National Park Rescue in Botswana said, "until a proper investigation is completed, nothing can be ruled out." Here are some of the photos that are causing concern with scientists and wildlife conservationists in Botswana.

 tells the story of how seven fairies showed up in a primitive village, and helped to generate 3 million yuan so far in 2020.

3 days to go!❗️Beijing is ready for the college entrance exams 📖starting on July 7. The city's education authorities require all people entering the sites, including staff and students, to have a 14-day temperature check and health monitor ahead of the exams. Each classroom is only allowed to have 20 candidates at most, separated by one meter. According to the Ministry of Education, a total of 10.71 million will sit for this year's national college entrance exams. #goodluck🍀 #bettertogether #brightfuture #cgtn

😡The Little Mermaid statue in Copenhagen, the city's most famous monument, was vandalized with the text "Racist Fish" graffiti on Friday. "We can confirm that The Little Mermaid has been vandalized some time before 9:00 am this morning," Copenhagen police said in a statement to AFP. Police and commentators were puzzled as to who might have done it and what their message really is. No one has taken responsibility for the act. 🤯The meaning of the apparent racist accusation has however so far left some scratching their heads. #littlemermaid #copenhagen #cgtn

Prague celebrated the end of COVID-19 lockdown measures in Czechia with a party on a huge table that stretched along the city's 500-meter Charles Bridge. With the remaining restriction in the country now being lifted, thousands of people gathered on the 14th century bridge to eat and drink to mark what they hope is the end of a troubled time. 

The country has a population of 10.7 million people but has recorded fewer than 12,000 infections and 350 deaths after implementing lockdown measures early in the pandemic.

❤️This is a warm hug given by Lily Hendrickx, 83, a resident in the nursing house "Le Jardin de Picardie" to the director of the house, through a plastic wall. A market in Bombay, India, has painted multiple one-square-meter yellow circles on the ground earlier this week, to remind customers to keep social distance while shopping. #coronavirus #india #socialdistancing

A gold-plated bathtub and a bathroom sink are seen in the newly inaugurated Dolce Hanoi Golden Lake luxury hotel in Hanoi, Vietnam, on July 2. Dolce Hanoi Golden Lake is the first golden-coated hotel in the country. The 25-story building is in the center of Hanoi. What makes the project unique is the abundance of 24K gold used in the exterior and interior decorations. 🛶🐟Bangladeshi fishermen catch fish using a traditional technique: a large net is pulled together by two small boats while fisherman hit the surface of the water with sticks to keep fish from escaping. Photographer Abdul Momin captured the men fishing in the Brahmaputra River in Gaibandha, Bangladesh. He explained, "Big fish usually jump and manage to escape the net. When the boats get close enough, they strike the water using sticks so that fish can't escape through the small gap between the boats." #cgtn #bangladesh #fishing

🥂Residents sat to dine on a 500-meter long table set on the Charles Bridge, after restrictions were eased on June 30 in Prague, the Czech Republic. Some 2,000 seats were proposed with people being invited to bring and share food and drinks to welcome summer. #cgtn #summer #prague

Heavy flooding triggered by monsoon rains has forced more than a million people to flee their homes in northeastern India. The pictures show villagers row makeshift rafts through a flooded field to reach a safer place at the flood-affected Mayong village in Morigaon district, northeastern state of Assam on June 29. #cgtn #india #flooding

🐶👮‍♂️Have you ever seen a corgi cop? Russia's only corgi cop @corgi_police_dog has retired from the force after seven and a half years of service with the transport police in Nizhny Novgorod. The nine-year-old Ryzhiy has helped law enforcement officers seize drugs and firearms thanks to his remarkable sniffing skills. Life after retirement will continue to be active for the pooch. Ryzhiy will be training in preparation for an upcoming dog race. #dog #animal #cgtn

After a 72-hour trial operation, the first unit of the Wudongde Hydropower Station, China's fourth-largest and the world's seventh-largest hydropower project, was officially put into operation on June 29. The station, located on the border of Sichuan and Yunnan provinces in southwest China, has a total installed capacity of 10.2 million kilowatts, with an average annual generating capacity of 38.91 billion kilowatts. It's estimated that the amount of hydropower produced by the station will save 12.2 million tons of standard coal. The clean energy will be transmitted to China Southern Power Grid to help develop the Guangdong-Hong Kong-Macao Greater Bay Area and other areas. The station will also serve as an important part of the Yangtze River Basin flood control system. #cgtn

🌾Farmers are seen playing in the mud as they plant rice seedlings at a paddy field during the National Paddy Day in Kathmandu, Nepal, June 29. The festival falls on "Asar 15" of the Nepali calendar. As the annual rice planting season begins, local people celebrate the festival by planting paddy, playing in the mud, singing traditional songs and eating yogurt. #festival #cgtn

The Three Gorges Dam started releasing floodwater for the first time this year on Monday to adjust the water level and ensure safety of flood control, as downpours on the upper and middle reaches of the Yangtze River have caused an increasing amount of water into the reservoir. The dam is located in the upper region of the Yangtze River in central China's Hubei Province. Millions of people have been affected as heavy rain continues to ravage China. #flooding #cgtn

India on Monday banned 59, mostly Chinese, mobile apps including Bytedance's TikTok and Tencent's WeChat in its strongest move yet targeting China in the online space since a border crisis erupted between the two countries earlier this month. The move came as tension between the two countries escalated following the Galwan Valley clashes on June 15, which resulted in casualties. Following the order, Google and Apple will have to remove these apps from the Android and iOS stores. And those that have already been downloaded "will all be deactivated." #india #socialmedia #cgtn

🤩Chinese ride-hailing giant Didi Chuxing launched a robotaxi service test in a Shanghai suburb on Saturday, after installing V2X (Vehicle to Everything) hardware throughout the area. 👍Under the test, users will be able to get a free trial ride using Didi's autonomous vehicles after making the reservation via their app. At the current stage, the service, equipped with safety drivers, is only available within a designated area in Shanghai, which will travel through exhibition centers, office areas, subway stations and hotels.

🤩Schools of peach blossom jellyfish, one of the world's most endangered species, were recently spotted in southwest China's Yunnan Province. 🌸Only the size of a human fingernail, these creatures are called "panda in the water" and regarded as a living fossil. #naturephotography #naturelovers #cgtn

🧑‍🎓Japan has produced its first ninja studies graduate after Genichi Mitsuhashi spent two years honing his martial arts skills and absorbing the finer traditions of the feudal martial arts agents. 👍The 45-year-old completed the master's course at Mie University in central Japan, the region considered the home of the ninja.

In addition to researching historical documents, Mitsuhashi took the practical aspect of being a ninja to heart. "I read that ninjas worked as farmers in the morning and trained in martial arts in the afternoon," he said. #martialarts #studymotivation #amazingfacts #cgtn

🚌The first two mobile nucleic acid testing units with four sample collecting windows each and air conditioning were put into use in #Beijing on Sunday. The buses can easily change locations while sparing medics the gruesome work of being exposed to the summer heat in full PPEs. #coronavirus #covid19 #stayhealthy #cgtn

Beijing is doing mass #COVID19 testing for university teachers and students amid a flare-up of infections. More than 100,000 people from about 100 Beijing-based universities are expected to be tested, of whom 70 percent are teachers. #cgtn

A tank-like unmanned disinfection vehicle was spotted in operation on June 25 in a residential community in Beijing's Fengtai District, where a cluster of #COVID19 cases was reportedly linked to Xinfadi wholesale market in the district. The one-meter-tall vehicle was transformed from a delivery vehicle into a disinfection vehicle. It took 40 minutes to complete the disinfection of the whole community. The remote-control vehicle, equipped with a radar and a dozen binocular cameras, can detect barriers ahead and automatically brakes when confronted with barriers or other vehicles. The vehicle can disinfect an area of up to 500,000 square meters. #cgtn

More than 1,000 people attended a Black Lives Matter protest on June 27 in Berlin demanding racial justice and an end to racial discrimination. Demonstrators gathered at the Victory Column while observing social distancing rules and wearing masks. The protest followed weeks of demonstrations around the world against police brutality in the wake of the killing of African American George Floyd in Minneapolis. Floyd's death sparked a wave of worldwide protests, with riots and looting also occurring in some areas. #blacklivesmatter #cgtn

China's border police in Lincang City, southwest China's Yunnan Province, burned 7.212 tonnes of #drugs on Wednesday as part of the anti-drug publicity activity on the International Day against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking. China has made great progress in the fight against drug trafficking and drug-related crimes, with the number of arrests and drug-related criminals all dropping in the period from the beginning of 2019 to May 2020. #antidrug #cgtn

A private #art collector in Valencia, Spain, paid a furniture restorer for the #restoration of the copy of "The Immaculate Conception of El Escorial" by the Spanish artist Bartolomé Esteban Murillo. However, the painting was totally disfigured despite two attempts to restore it to its original state. Art restoration experts in Spain called on June 23 for tighter regulation of the work and strongly condemned the botched restoration of this Baroque-era painting of the Virgin Mary. #virginmary #artrestoration #cgtn

June 26 marks the International Day Against Drug Abuse and Illicit Trafficking, a United Nations International Day against drug abuse and the illegal drug trade. Police in various cities in China get into schools and communities to hold related seminars, explaining the danger of drugs. #antidrug #dangerofdrug #cgtn

Do you know this boy? His name is Tony Hudgell, who suffered near-fatal abuse from his birth parents when he was a baby that resulted in the #amputation of his legs. Recently, he has raised more than 1.7 million U.S. dollars for the London hospital that saved his life by walking 10 kilometers on his new prosthetic legs after being inspired by Captain Tom Moore's record-breaking challenge, a 95-year-old senior walking 100 laps of his garden using a walking frame, raising 40 million dollars. Deciding on his next #challenge was a "hard question," Tony said, but longer term, he is set on becoming a policeman. "I want to handcuff bad people and robbers," he said. #tonyhudgell #fundraising #warmstory #cgtn

The Dragon Boat Festival, otherwise known as the Duanwu or Tuen Ng Festival, is one of China's major traditional festivals. Two positive-pressure #nucleic acid sampling workstations have been put into use in Beijing Tiantan Sports Center. The internal air pressure of the workstation is 30 Pa higher than outside, preventing external air flow from entering. Medical workers no longer need to wear heavy protective suits for taking samples in Beijing's hot summer weather, and can avoid suffering from #sunstroke. #coronavirus #covid19 #beijing #sampling #cgtn

The BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) has helped Beijing launch an unmanned vehicle delivery service that has helped people get daily necessities more safely during the #COVID19 epidemic. In Shunyi District, residents near the Hualikan Market can choose to use the service after making an order online. This method has been helpful for delivery drivers and customers, as it reduces contact and has eased the increasing workload off of delivery staff. #beidou #satellite #cgtn

Heavy rain and storms battered parts of southwest China's Guizhou Province, Chongqing Municipality and some other southern provinces and regions from June 21 to 22, triggering flash floods. Heavy downpours led to water rise exceeding danger levels in 58 rivers of 12 provinces and cities. Houses and crops were damaged. Three people were killed and over 10,000 residents evacuated on Monday as the floods hit Guizhou. A red alert was issued by Chongqing Hydrological Monitoring Station after a flood crest passed through the Qihe River in the southern part of the city the same day. China's Ministry of Water Resources has called for all-out efforts to prevent floods as continuous downpours threatened to inundate rivers and cause damage. Authorities have dispatched six teams to the affected areas to facilitate flood prevention and control. #cgtn #flooding

Walking like a hamster in a wheel, Swiss acrobat Ramon Kathriner performs "Wheel of the Death" on the edge of a mountain during an air show in Les Diablerets, Switzerland on June 23. He was one of several daredevils who performed at the show to honor those in the entertainment industry affected by #COVID19. #acrobatics #cgtn

Beijing's first #COVID19 testing lab built with an air-inflated structure went into trial operation on June 23 at a sports venue in the southern Daxing District. The mobile Huoyan (Fire Eye) laboratory was built in two days over the weekend to handle the city's rising demand for nucleic acid tests after a new cluster of local infections was confirmed. The lab has nine air-inflated film chambers, with three as sample receiving areas and the other six for accommodating 14 automated COVID-19 testing machines. Once in full operation, the lab can cope with nearly 30,000 nucleic acid tests a day. #cgtn

China launched the last satellite of the BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) from Xichang Satellite Launch Center in southwest China's Sichuan Province. The satellite, carried by a Long March-3B carrier rocket, is the 30th BDS-3 satellite and the 55th of the whole BeiDou satellite family. The launch marks the completion of China's BeiDou global navigation network. #cgtn #beidou #satellite #navigation #china

The National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) of the U.S. has released mesmerizing pictures depicting two nearby planetary nebulae, NGC 6302 and NGC 7027, captured by its Hubble Space Telescope. NGC 6302 is nicknamed the Butterfly Nebula because of its wing-like appearance, and NGC 7027 has been dubbed "jewel bug" due to its resemblance to a jewel bug, an insect with a colorful metallic shell. Both nebulae are probably descended from progenitor stars around three to five times the mass of the Sun. #cgtn #nasa #nebula #universe

The last satellite of the BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) was successfully launched into space from the Xichang Satellite Launch Center in southwest China's Sichuan Province on Tuesday morning, marking the completion of the country's domestically developed BeiDou constellation, one of four global navigation networks alongside the United States' GPS, Russia's GLONASS and the European Union's Galileo. The launch of the final satellite had been previously scheduled on June 16, but was delayed after technical problems were found with the Long March-3B rocket in pre-launch tests. #cgtn #beidou #satellite #china #navigation #rocket

Eleven members of the Beijing Blue Sky Rescue Team carried out a voluntary disinfection operation at Beijing's Jingshen Seafood Market on June 22, 2020, as epidemic prevention and control in the city entered a critical moment. #cgtn #beijing #coronavirus #covid19 #disinfection #seafoodmarket

⛰️Laojun Mountain in Luoyang City, central China's Henan Province, has an altitude of over 2,200 meters. The mountain owes its name to the famous philosopher Lao Tzu, founder of Taoism who resided on the mountain as a hermit. The main attractions include Zhongtianmen Square, Jinding and Laojun Temple. The mountain's charming peaks are surrounded by clouds, a stunning view enjoyed on top of the mountain.☁️☁️☁️ #cgtn #temple #mountains #nature #clouds
☀️The annular solar eclipse, popularly known as the "ring of fire" eclipse, was seen across much of Asia and West Africa on June 21. #cgtn #solareclipse #ringoffire
Tourists walk on a glass bridge above the lotus pond in Ming Yue Hu Park, in Yangzhou City, east China's Jiangsu Province, on June 21, 2020. #cgtn #nature #lotus #park

👨A group of fathers-to-be marked Father's Day with exercises in infant care studies on Sunday. They took lessons on how to hold babies correctly, feed them, change diapers and bathe them. The lessons were given by medical staff at the Handan Maternity and Child Health Care Hospital in Hebei Province. Co-held by the Handan Maternity and Child Health Care Hospital and the district's local health bureau, the celebration event aimed to help prepare fathers-to-be to take good care of their newborns. 👶#cgtn #fathersday #father #newborn

🌖🌗🌘 "Ring of fire" solar #eclipse thrilled skywatchers on Sunday (June 21) in China's Tibet, Zhengzhou City and Beijing. The celestial spectacle will be visible in parts of Africa and Asia. Are you able to witness this rare celestial phenomenon there? Tell us in the comments below! #cgtn

Tong Tong is a #COVID19 patient with mild symptoms. His father was infected when he was shopping for groceries at Xinfadi market in Beijing, where a new local cluster appeared in China's capital. A day later, he was confirmed infected with the virus. So far, the boy feels fine and talks about his experience at the hospital with a positive attitude. #coronavirus #cgtn

🧘🏻‍♀️Do you dare to do #yoga on a cliff? A group of Chinese yoga enthusiasts challenged themselves to perform yoga on the cliffs of the 2,000-meter-high Funiu Mountains in Luoyang City, central China's Henan Province on Saturday, to welcome the International Day of Yoga, which falls on June 21 every year. The festival has been celebrated annually since 2015, following its inception in the United Nations General Assembly in 2014. Yoga is a physical, mental and spiritual practice that originated in India. (Warning: Please do not imitate without professional guidance.) #cgtn

🎓🎓🎓Wuhan University held a special #graduation #ceremony on June 20 in Wuhan City, central China's Hubei Province, the former epicenter of the #COVID19 outbreak in China. A total of 660 graduates attended the ceremony and observed a moment of silence in memory of people who died of the virus. Those who couldn't attend were able to gather with their colleagues online by watching a 5G livestream of the ceremony. According to the university, graduates who failed to attend the graduation ceremony this year could attend one in the following three years. Wuhan University reopened to final-year bachelor's, master's and doctoral degree students earlier in June, after it was closed for nearly six months due to the #coronavirus outbreak in the city. #cgtn

On June 18, Hong Kong Disneyland reopened to a limited number of local visitors after the COVID-19 outbreak forced the theme park to close in late January. With enhanced health measures put into effect, the park's first paying guests queued to get into the park through temperature screening, ticket scanning and security checks on the first morning of the reopening, many of them families with children. To better ensure safety, the park adopts social distancing measures throughout all the facilities as well as in any queues. Meanwhile, it also reduced the capacity in terms of dining and shopping locations. #cgtn #HongKong #hk #disneyland #themepark #coronavirus #covid19 #china

Unfazed by lockdown measures, student artists from Liverpool John Moores University have held a virtual end-of-course showcase... on Mars. In the "multiverse" experience, visitors to the degree show's website can head to the Red Planet and take in the Gale crater thanks to 3D scans from NASA. #cgtn #mars #universe #planet #nasa

Mirror, mirror on the car, who is the fairest of all birds? A bullfinch bird was caught seeing itself in the mirror of a car on June 19, 2020, in Rheda-Wiedenbrueck, a town in the district of Gutersloh in North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany. #cgtn #nature #bullfinch #bird #germany

Samburu warrior Hitlan Lekoripo blowing the community horn on a sacred mountain for the Samburu, in Northern Kenya. The horn is blown during special occasions for the Samburu. This photo was taken during a shoot for Tribes In A Flux, a brand new series airing from June 24.
Credits: Ishmael Azeli, Location: Ololokwe, Kenya.
#TribesInAFlux #AfricanTribes

China released the gene sequence data for the #COVID19 virus from Beijing's #Xinfadi market #infection cluster on Thursday, according to the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), which also submitted the #genome sequencing data for the virus to the #WorldHealthOrganization (WHO). #covid_19 #coronavirus #Beijing #cgtn

Edgard Zapashny, head of the Great #Moscow State #Circus, is having a moment with a tiger by a #chess table in the circus' building. The circus has played a key role in #Russian cultural traditions. Hailed as an art form similar to #opera or #ballet, it features #acrobats, trapeze artists, balancers and clowns, as well as #animal performances such as those featuring #tigers, lions, bears and elephants. #russianculture #animalperformance #animalcircus #cgtn

Colombian actress and puppeteer Yohana Yara has been broadcasting puppet shows live on her #balcony during #lockdown time in Madrid, #Spain on Tuesday. She moved to the Spanish capital and soon, after two months, the city went into lockdown. Filled with boredom and disappointment, she changed her plan of getting an arts job to creating a #YouTube channel for her own show "Leo the Lion and His Friends." She has been uploading videos with children's stories, poems and songs, cultivating an audience of youngsters. Yara thought the unexpected situation could create something special. "I think that in times of crisis, creativity surges and you start working with what you have at home," she told Malay Mail on Thursday. #Madrid #lockdownlife #cgtn

#Samburu warrior Lemaiyan standing on a sacred mountain in Ololokwe in #NorthernKenya during a shoot of #TribeInAFlux, a brand new series by @cgtn_africa starting June 24. Credits: Ishmael Azeli #AfricanTribes #Kenya #CGTN

As many as 410 Chinese #peacekeepers in the #UN Interim Force in Lebanon (UNIFIL) were awarded the United Nations Peace Medal of Honor on Tuesday for their contributions to keeping peace in southern #Lebanon. #cgtn

Reality or an illusion? Are your eyes tricking you? An artist from Indonesia painted vivid animals and flowers on stones in the city of Bogor. This kind of art piece can be sold at a high price on the market. #painting #artwork #stonepainting #cgtn

A "green #highway" snakes through world's second largest shifting sand #desert, the #Taklimakan Desert, which is also known as "the Sea of Death" in northwest China's #Xinjiang #Uygur Autonomous Region. The 552-kilometer-long highway was built in 1995 and has long been seen as an important road for economic development in the southern part of the autonomous region. The trees planted along the road function as an environmentally-friendly way of protecting vehicles from sand blown by the wind. #cgtn

These rare one-month-old white lion quadruplet #cubs made their debut in Nantong Forest Wildlife Park, east China's Jiangsu Province, on Tuesday. Three of them are females and all the four cubs are in good health. #cute #whitelion #lioncubs #cgtn

Yuegezhuang wholesale #market in the #Fengtai District was thoroughly #disinfected on Tuesday after a #COVID19 cluster appeared in Beijing. Over 30 volunteers from Blue Sky Rescue, one of the biggest #NGOs in China dedicated to rescue work and disaster relief, joined the operation. Local authorities ordered a wide inspection over food security on Saturday, especially in wholesale markets, supermarkets and #grocery stores, after numerous cases were registered at the district's #Xinfadi market. #coronavirus #covid_19 #cgtn

The #ChineseAcademyofSciences held a press conference on Tuesday to introduce the latest progress in the #research of the world's first #quantum scientific experiment satellite, #Micius. The team led by #Academician Pan Jianwei from the University of Science and Technology of China, together with other teams of international #scientists, created the world's first entangled quantum key distribution at 1,000 #kilometers, making an important #breakthrough in the practical application of quantum communication. #quantumphysics #ultrasecure #cgtn

Two swarms of bees were found on the saddles of rental bikes in #Berlin, #Germany on Tuesday. While the rest of the world is worrying about the reduction of bee numbers, Berlin and other regions in Germany have growing concerns about having too many. 🐝🐝 Besides, the insect population continues to grow. Consumers in the German capital have been seeing more #organic honey available in local grocery stores and farmers' markets since last year, reported by the Independent. #beehives #beepopulation #honey #organic #cgtn

@AustralianReptilePark welcomed perhaps its cutest resident ever – a baby #Parma #wallaby joey. The four-month-old male joey is being raised by the staff after it was discovered abandoned by his mum, sadly, on a wallaby exhibition. 🦘The keepers at the park have named the joey as Bouddi, which means "heart" in local language, and also is the name of the largest national park on the #CentralCoast, New South Wales. 😉😉The task is not easy: Staff members have to provide the #mammal with round the clock care and attention to ensure he is warm and cozy. It needs to be fed five times a day, including a feed at 3 a.m. Thankfully, #Bouddi is thriving – he is gaining weight and the fur is growing. Soon he will return to the family of Parma wallabies at the park. #extinction #wildanimal #nsw #wallaby #joey #cgtn

The second-grade students of a middle school in Harbin City, capital of northeast China's Heilongjiang Province, returned to school on Monday after a months-long delay due to the #coronavirus pandemic. The number of students in each classroom is limited to 20, each table is 1.5 meters apart and a plastic shield is placed in front of each student to prevent the spread of the virus. #cgtn #covid_19

A group of protesters tore down a Thomas Jefferson statue in front of a high school in Portland, U.S. on Sunday. Thomas Jefferson served as the third president of the United States. He was credited with writing "all men are created equal" into the U.S. Constitution despite owning more than 600 slaves throughout his life. #cgtn #blacklivesmatter

.
Liat belanjaanku yang barusan datang lengkap banget dan yang bikin senengnya lagi itu kita gaperlu takut kualitasnya jelek gara2 ga milih sendiri barangnya karena yang datang kualitasnya oke banget 🙌🏼
.
Terus ternyata belanja di TaniHub itu kalian ikut membantu orang2 yang terkena dampak COVID-19 karena 2% dari total belanja di TaniHub akan disumbangkan dalam bentuk masker kain dan paket sembako. Dann dengan beli di aplikasi TaniHub kalian juga ikut membantu petani lokal ! 👩‍🌾
Keren banget ya belanja kebutuhan dapur dengan gampang lewat aplikasi terus bisa berbagi berkat juga!
.
Yuk #BangkitkanKebaikan bareng2 dengan belanja di aplikasi TaniHub ✨
.
Untuk kalian yang di Bandung-Sumedang, Bali, Surabaya-Malang, dan Yogyakarta kalian juga bisa ikutan untuk #BangkitkanKebaikan bareng2 karena TaniHub juga ada di kota kalian!

Walaupun sekarang lagi #dirumahaja, pasti pada setuju deh kalo pergi sama anak itu bawaan kita kayak mau pindah rumah?
Tapi kalau aku, dari Vechia bayi (newborn) sampai sekarang aku punya pouch khusus yang selalu ada di tas, isinya perlengkapannya Vechia.
Nah karena kebiasaan praktis ini, walaupun di rumah pun aku tetep biasanya pake MY BABY Hair & Body Wash, yaitu sabun dan shampoo 2in1 dari @mybabyid yang efektif membersihkan rambut sekaligus badan si kecil.
Produk ini mengandung bahan alami (aloe vera & avocado) yang bikin rambut dan kulit halus dan lembut, nggak licin (jadi aman buat si Kecil yang badannya masih mungil), mudah dibilas, dan yang paling penting itu tidak pedih di mata plus sudah teruji klinis jadi bikin #MandiBebasWorry deh.
.
Oiyaa, buat moms yang mau beli produk MY BABY Hair & Body Wash walaupun lagi #dirumahaja, bisa langsung cek di MY BABY Official Store di Shopee atau di Tempo Official Store di Shopee ya!
#TipsIbuCerdasMYBABY

Salam sehat Indonesia!!
Ada kabar baik nih buat teman-teman.
Sekarang ada program GEMAS (Gerakan Memakai Masker Gratis), yang akan bagi-bagi jutaan masker kain GRATIS!
.
Ingat ya, pakai masker itu harus untuk kesehatan kita bersama, terutama disaat pandemi sekarang ini.
Memang awalnya kurang nyaman. Tapi lama-lama akan terbiasa. Dan jangan lupa, setiap hari masker kainnya harus dicuci bersih ya!
.
Mau tau cara dapetin masker kain gratis?
Klik link https://api.whatsapp.com/send?phone=6281319200030&text=GEMAS atau 
WA di nomor 0813-1920-0030
.
Sekali lagi ini GRATIS, jadi jangan mau kalau ada yang memperjual belikan. Kita ambil sesuai kebutuhan. Karena banyak saudara kita yang membutuhan.
Ikutan GEMAS ya.
Indonesia pasti bisa melalui semua cobaan ini 🙏🏻
.

#pakemasker

1. Follow IG & FB @komixherbal.id

3. Repost postingan #CintaAntiKepotek ya, di stories kamu aja kok dan jangan lupa di-highlight.
4. Periode nya 8-12 Februari (hari ini terakhir nihhh!!) buruan makanya biar dapet Gopay buat dinner Valentine kamu.
.

Nemenin anak bayi lagi spa nihhh 😍😌🌸

Jadi beberapa hari ini tuh aku liat Vechia kayanya kecapean liburan, gara2 berenang & kena angin pantai terus 🥴 Jadinya agak rewel, dan makannya juga ga segampang biasanya. Makanya aku iseng2 cari baby spa di Bali, dan nemu @pamperme_babyspa 😍
.
Ini aku ambil Toddler Very Berry Spa buat treatment nya Vechia 🍓😍. Awalnya agak kuatir Vechia gamau dipijat sih. Tapi ternyata engga lho, Vechia malah kaya nikmatin gitu dipijat sama therapistnya yang emang telaten banget, sambil main2 & nonton TV 😆. Terus selesai massage, lanjut strawberry bath deh, berendam pake strawberry milk powder buat nutrisi kulit jadi lebih lembut 💕
.
Thank youuuu @pamperme_babyspa for pampering Vechia.
We surely will come back! 😍❤️
.

Terjadi obrolan cukup berat semalam, entah kenapa hati ini tergerak untuk ke rumah mama. bayangan saat dulu tinggal di Tangerang belakangan ini sering muncul, suka dan dukanya. Mungkin Rindu! Benar saja, Papa membuka ceritanya. sudah lama gw ga ngobrol berdua, dulu selalu kita membuka cerita, jarang lho anak perempuan dan ayahnya bisa sangat terbuka. ⁣
⁣
Guratan tua di tubuhnya ngebuat gw tetep bangga punya sosok papa yang seperti ini. KERAS & tangguh ngejalanin terjangan hidup. Entah ada angin apa, papa membuka cerita kelamnya dulu, 1 sosok pria di tengah 4 wanita di keluarganya. bagaimana ia di besarkan orang tuanya. yang akhirnya membentuk pola didik keras yang gw dan adik gw terima. cukup berat saat itu, dan gw memiliki inner child yang kurang baik, tapi gw mencoba memutus mata rantai tersebut agar anak2 gw ga merasakan “KERAS”nya metode orang tua dulu. Pola dulu gabisa di copy 100% untuk mendidik generasi sekarang. ⁣
⁣
Yang membuat gw menangis, tadi malama Papa minta maaf akan perilakunya dulu, ga kuat hati ini mendengar kalimat itu. Ga ada dendam, hanya pelajaran yang justru membuat gw tau bahwa hal tsb ga akan gw terapin ke anak gw. Jangan pernah merasa salah ya Pah, akan selalu ada ruang untuk saling memaafkan. justru Tantri mau berterimakasih atas apapun itu, tanpa didikan Papa, ga akan ada Tantri yang tangguh dan mandiri untuk bisa mengerti dan menjalani arus kerasnya hidup. Sehat selalu dan bahagia selalu ya Pah!

Transisi karakter yang disertai suara tangis seorang bayi, status ibu merubah cara pandang hidup. Bahwa ada malaikat kecil yang akan tumbuh bersama. Gadis kecil ini sudah banyak memberi pelajaran, pelajaran sabar! Selamat pagi MATAHARI dan Kamu PEJUANG HIDUP!

ARKAIRAN KADENZA TANARDA⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Awal hamil di deteksi Toksoplasma, lahir di tengah pandemi, usia 14 hari masuk RS karena ketularan kakaknya Bapil, Padahal tahun ini shionya Tikus Emas yang katanya adalah shio keberuntungan. Semua dijalani dengan rasa syukur karena gw tau generasi yang lahir di tahun ini adalah generasi2 kuat karena sejak lahir harus berjuang.⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Gw tau banget rasanya menahan diri buat ibu2 yang punya bayi, nahan untuk ga ngajak anak2nya ke taman, nahan untuk makein baju2 bagusnya hanya untuk di rumah atau sekedar ke RS buat vaksin, nahan untuk ga ketemu banyak orang karena rentan tertular virus. ⁣⁣
⁣⁣
Semoga generasi2 ini tumbuh dengan kuat ya! Karena kamu lahir di tahun terberat. Lav yu Anak Bujangku ❤️
